com.wj.android.messageviewer.message

Class MMSMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wj.android.messageviewer.message.SMSMessage
      • com.wj.android.messageviewer.message.MMSMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMessage, java.lang.Comparable<IMessage>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SMILMessage

    public class MMSMessage
extends SMSMessage
    The MMSMessage class represents a Multimedia Message without a presentation definition.

    A device who receives this Message will decide how and in which order the MMSMessagePart are displayed. Use the subclass SMILMessage if you want to define the presentation with SMIL.

    Author:
    Werner Jaeger

      • getMessageText

        public java.lang.String getMessageText()
        Gets the text of this message.

        If a not null text is explicitly set via setMessageText(java.lang.String) this text is returned, otherwise it concatenates the subject plus texts of all parts, separating each part text with two newlines.

        Specified by:
        getMessageText in interface IMessage
        Overrides:
        getMessageText in class SMSMessage
        Returns:
        the concatenated texts of subject and all parts. Never null.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
